import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline
df = pd.read_csv('../input/nutrition-facts/menu.csv')
source.3b8bb6a8:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

meals = df.head(110) # semua makanan (tanpa minuman) di 110 baris pertama csv
meals_cal = pd.DataFrame({'Item': meals.Item, 'Calories': meals.Calories}) 
meals_sort = meals_cal.sort_values('Calories', ascending=False) 
meals_sort.plot.bar(x='Item', y='Calories', figsize= (25,10), title='Nilai kalori pada makanan di McDonalds') 
plt.show()

source.43c5931e:
brkf = df.loc[df.Category == 'Breakfast']
bnp = df.loc[df.Category == 'Beef & Pork']
cnf = df.loc[df.Category == 'Chicken & Fish']
sld = df.loc[df.Category == 'Salads']
snass = df.loc[df.Category == 'Snacks & Sides']
dess = df.loc[df.Category == 'Desserts'] 
bev = df.loc[df.Category == 'Beverages']
cnt = df.loc[df.Category == 'Coffee & Tea']
ss = df.loc[df.Category == 'Smoothies & Shakes']

import seaborn as sns

avg_cat = [round(brkf['Calories'].mean(axis=0), 2), round(bnp['Calories'].mean(axis=0), 2), 
           round(cnf['Calories'].mean(axis=0), 2), round(sld['Calories'].mean(axis=0), 2), 
           round(snass['Calories'].mean(axis=0), 2), round(dess['Calories'].mean(axis=0), 2),
          round(bev['Calories'].mean(axis=0), 2), round(cnt['Calories'].mean(axis=0), 2),
           round(ss['Calories'].mean(axis=0), 2)]
index = ['Breakfast', 'Beef & Pork', 'Chicken & Fish', 'Salads', 'Snacks & Sides', 'Desserts', 'Beverages',
         'Coffee & Tea', 'Smoothies & Shakes']
avg_calat= pd.DataFrame({'Rata-rata kalori': avg_cat}, index=index)
ax = avg_calat.plot.bar(rot=0, color='maroon', figsize=(13,8), 
                        title='Rata-rata kalori pada setiap kategori makanan (dalam Kalori)', legend=False)
for p in ax.patches:
    ax.annotate(str(p.get_height()), (p.get_x() * 1.005, p.get_height() * 1.005))
source.2541d9df:
print("JAWABAN : Rata-rata kalori dari semua makanan McD (tanpa minuman) adalah ", 
      round(meals.Calories.mean(axis=0), 2), " Kalori")
source.9d7ec26d:
menu = open("../input/minumanmcd/drinksmenu-cal.csv").read() # opens and read mcd nutritional info

rows = menu.split('\n')
final_data =[]
for row in rows: 
    split_list = row.split(',')
    final_data.append(split_list) # adds these elements to the final_data list

#print(final_data)

categories = []
for r in final_data: 
    final_datas = r[0] # each rows contains the first element from final data
    categories.append(final_datas) # add those first elements/cities to the cities list

#print(categories[0:5])

cat_slice = categories[1:len(categories)] # removes the category header

# code to count the number of categories in a list using a dictionary
category_counts = {}
for c in cat_slice:
    if c in category_counts:
        category_counts[c] = category_counts[c] + 1 
    else: 
        category_counts[c] = 1

print('\n',category_counts,'\n')

calories = []
for r in final_data:
    final_datas = r[2]
    calories.append(final_datas)

cal_slice = calories[1:len(calories)]

# print(cal_slice)

cal_int = []
for c in cal_slice:
    cal = int(c)
    cal_int.append(cal)

high_cal = [] # empty list of high calories
low_cal = [] 
for cal in cal_int:
    if cal > 150: 
        high_cal.append(cal) # add calories > 150 to high_cal list 
    else:
        low_cal.append(cal)

high_cal_single = []
for hc in high_cal:
    if hc in high_cal_single:
        pass # don't add cal if already in the list - avoids repeat cals
    else:
        high_cal_single.append(hc)

low_cal_single = []
for lc in low_cal:
    if lc in low_cal_single:
        pass # don't add cal if already in the list - avoids repeat cals
    else:
        low_cal_single.append(lc)



print("Range of High Calorie Drinks", '\n', sorted(high_cal_single),'\n')
print("Range of Low Calorie Drinks", '\n', sorted(low_cal_single),'\n')



items = []
for i in final_data:
    item = i[1]
    items.append(item)
item_slice = items[1:len(items)]

item_cal = dict(zip(item_slice, cal_int)) # pairs items and calories in a dictionary
# print(item_slice)

# hlatte = item_cal["Hazelnut Latte (Large)"]
# print("A Large Hazelnut Latte has",hlatte, "calories",'\n')

low_items = [k for k,v in item_cal.items() if v <= 150] # these items are less than 150 calories each
print("LOW CALORIE DRINKS",*low_items, sep='\n') # seperates each item per line

high_items = [k for k,v in item_cal.items() if v > 150] 
print('\n',"HIGH CALORIE DRINKS",*high_items, sep='\n') # seperates each item per line

print('\n',"USE calories(name of drink in quotes) TO GET IT'S CALORIES")  
def calories(drink_name, drinks_list = item_cal):  
    output = (drinks_list[drink_name])
    message = print("A",drink_name,"has", output, "calories!") 
    return(message)

source.6a5e61d0:
crispy_chsod = pd.DataFrame({'Item': crispy.Item, 'Cholesterol': crispy.Cholesterol, 'Sodium': crispy.Sodium})
crispy_chsod_sort = crispy_chsod.sort_values('Sodium', ascending=False) #sort by sodium amount
ax = crispy_chsod_sort.plot.barh(x='Item', y=['Cholesterol','Sodium'], stacked=False, figsize= (10,15), color=['yellow', 'orange'])
ax.set_title("Total Cholesterol and Sodium in Crispy Chicken Menu Category (in mg)")
#for p in ax.patches:
#    ax.annotate(str(p.get_width()), (p.get_x() * 1.005, p.get_width() * 1.005))
#ax = crispy.plot.barh(stacked=True, figsize=(10, 12))
for p in ax.patches:
    left, bottom, width, height = p.get_bbox().bounds
    ax.annotate(str(width), xy=(left+width/2, bottom+height/2), 
                horizontalalignment='left', verticalalignment='center')

crispy_sdf_sort = crispy_sdf.sort_values('Sugars', ascending=False) #sort by sugar amount

ax.set_title("Total Sugars and Dietary Fiber in Crispy Chicken Menu Category (in g)")
#ax = grilled.plot.barh(stacked=True, figsize=(10, 12))
for p in ax.patches:
    left, bottom, width, height = p.get_bbox().bounds
    ax.annotate(str(width), xy=(left+width/2, bottom+height/2), 
                horizontalalignment='left', verticalalignment='center') # Give annotation to the chart

source.2a02bd88:
# Get the amount of vitamins and minerals in Crispy Chicken category
crispy_vm = pd.DataFrame({'Item': crispy.Item, 'Vit A': crispy['Vitamin A (% Daily Value)'], 'Vit C': crispy['Vitamin C (% Daily Value)'], 'Calcium': crispy['Calcium (% Daily Value)'], 'Iron': crispy['Iron (% Daily Value)']})
crispy_vm_sort = crispy_vm.sort_values('Vit A', ascending=False) #sort by vit A amount
ax = crispy_vm_sort.plot.barh(x='Item', y=['Vit A','Vit C', 'Calcium', 'Iron'], stacked=False, figsize= (8,15), colormap='spring')
ax.set_title("Total Vitamins and Minerals in Crispy Chicken Menu Category (in %DV)")
for p in ax.patches:
    left, bottom, width, height = p.get_bbox().bounds
    ax.annotate(str(width), xy=(left+width/2, bottom+height/2), 
                horizontalalignment='left', verticalalignment='center') # Give annotation to the chart

# PUTIH TELUR
whites_egg = pd.DataFrame({'Item': whites.Item,'Carbohydrates': whites.Carbohydrates,'Protein':whites.Protein,
                             'Dietary Fiber':whites.DietaryFiber, 'Sodium':whites.Sodium})
whites_egg_sort = whites_egg.sort_values('Carbohydrates', ascending=False)

# TELUR UTUH
whole_egg = pd.DataFrame({'Item': whole.Item, 'Carbohydrates': whole.Carbohydrates, 'Protein':whole.Protein,
                           'Dietary Fiber':whole.DietaryFiber, 'Sodium':whole.Sodium})
whole_egg_sort = whole_egg.sort_values('Carbohydrates', ascending=False) 

# RATA-RATA
avg_whites_carb = round(whites.Carbohydrates.mean(axis=0), 2)
avg_whites_pro = round(whites.Protein.mean(axis=0), 2)
avg_whites_fib = round(whites.DietaryFiber.mean(axis=0), 2)
avg_whites_sod = round(whites.Sodium.mean(axis=0), 2)

avg_whole_carb = round(whole.Carbohydrates.mean(axis=0), 2)
avg_whole_pro = round(whole.Protein.mean(axis=0), 2)
avg_whole_fib = round(whole.DietaryFiber.mean(axis=0), 2)
avg_whole_sod = round(whole.Sodium.mean(axis=0), 2)

# Plot bar chart 
avg_egg_carb = [avg_whites_carb, avg_whole_carb]
avg_egg_pro = [avg_whites_pro, avg_whole_pro]
avg_egg_fib = [avg_whites_fib, avg_whole_fib]
avg_egg_sod = [avg_whites_sod, avg_whole_sod]


index = ['PUTIH TELUR', 'TELUR UTUH']
avg_egg_total = pd.DataFrame({'Rata2 Karbohidrat': avg_egg_carb,'Rata2 Protein': avg_egg_pro,'Rata2 Fiber': avg_egg_fib,
                            'Rata2 Sodium': avg_egg_sod},index=index)
ax = avg_egg_total.plot.bar(rot=0, color=['red','blue','green','brown'], figsize=(10,5))
ax.set_title("Rata-rata Karbohidrat, Protein, Fiber, Sodium pada Putih Telur and Telur Utuh (satuan mg)")
for p in ax.patches:
    ax.annotate(str(p.get_height()), (p.get_x() * 1.005, p.get_height() * 1.005))

df_sfat = df.loc[:,'Saturated Fat (% Daily Value)']

df_sod = df.loc[:,'Sodium (% Daily Value)']

df_fib = df.loc[:,'Dietary Fiber (% Daily Value)']
df_vita = df.loc[:,'Vitamin A (% Daily Value)']
df_vitc = df.loc[:,'Vitamin C (% Daily Value)']
df_cal = df.loc[:,'Calcium (% Daily Value)']
df_ir = df.loc[:,'Iron (% Daily Value)']

min_sfat = round((100)/df_sfat)
min_chol = round((100)/df_chol)
min_sod = round((100)/df_sod)
min_carb = round((100)/df_carb)
min_fib = round((100)/df_fib)

min_vitc = round((100)/df_vitc)
min_cal = round((100)/df_cal)
min_ir = round((100)/df_ir)
source.a1b02cb4:
df_minbuy = pd.concat([df2, min_tfat, min_sfat,min_chol,min_sod,min_carb,min_fib,min_vita,min_vitc,min_cal,min_ir], axis=1)

df_minbuy.rename(columns = {'Total Fat (% Daily Value)':'Total Fat (pcs)', 'Saturated Fat (% Daily Value)':'Saturated Fat (pcs)', 
                              'Cholesterol (% Daily Value)':'Cholesterol (pcs)','Sodium (% Daily Value)':'Sodium (pcs)',
                            'Carbohydrates (% Daily Value)':'Carbohydrates (pcs)','Dietary Fiber (% Daily Value)':'Dietary Fiber (pcs)',
                            'Vitamin A (% Daily Value)':'Vitamin A (pcs)','Vitamin C (% Daily Value)':'Vitamin C (pcs)',
                            'Calcium (% Daily Value)':'Calcium (pcs)','Iron (% Daily Value)':'Iron (pcs)'}, inplace=True) 

df_minbuy.style.set_caption("Jumlah minimal makanan yang dibeli untuk memenuhi kebutuhan nutrisi harian")
source.989e88b4: JAWABAN: Putih telur mengandung nutrisi lebih tinggi dilhat dari karbohidrat dan proteinnya
source.fce5c7bf:
# Nutrition Fact for McDonald’s Menu

Data yang berisi informasi nutrisi pada setiap menu McDonalds di US pada tahun 2017. Sumber : [https://www.kaggle.com/mcdonalds/nutrition-facts](https://www.kaggle.com/mcdonalds/nutrition-facts)
source.10726b9e: Lihat nilai kalori pada setiap makanan
source.0190be6f: Menghitung berapa jumlah makanan yang harus dibeli untuk memenuhi kebutuhan pada tiap nutrisi. Hasil pembagian dibulatkan ke atas
source.e554b985: Import data yg berbentuk csv dan pastikan tidak ada cell yang kosong
source.9a675d41: Menampilkan item dan jumlah minimal makanan yang dibeli untuk memenuhi kebutuhan nutrisi harian
source.2d289c30: ## b) Berapa banyak minuman ,seperti soda atau kopi, berkontribusi secara keseluruhan pada asupan kalori?
source.2e44b1a7: ## e) Berapa jumlah terkecil makanan yang bisa di pesan dari menu untuk memenuhi kebutuhan nutrisi dalam sehari?
source.75752ac7: ## a) Berapa banyak rata-rata nilai kalori pada menu makanan McDonald's ?
source.2d906f92: JAWABAN : Ada 6 menu minuman (soda/ kopi) berkalori tinggi dan 3 menu minuman (kopi/teh) berkalori rendah  yang berkontribusi pada asupan kalori.
source.f5a9ccd2:
# Pertanyaan : 

a) Berapa banyak rata-rata nilai kalori pada menu makanan McDonald's ?

b) Berapa banyak minuman ,seperti soda atau kopi, berkontribusi secara keseluruhan pada asupan kalori?

c) Apakah memesan ayam panggang daripada ayam renyah meningkatkan nilai nutrisi sandwich?

d) Bagaimana nilai nutrisi memesan putih telur daripada telur utuh? 

e) Berapa jumlah terkecil makanan yang bisa di pesan dari menu untuk memenuhi kebutuhan nutrisi dalam sehari?
source.e3f570ba:
KESIMPULAN: Nutrisi  sandwich ayam panggang lebih baik daripada ayam renyah dilihat dari aspek :



1.   Vit A dan Vit C pada ayam panggang lebih tinggi
2.   Kadar Sugar pada ayam panggang lebih rendah
source.f00cae51: JAWABAN : Dengan asumsi jumlah yang harus dibeli berdasarkan kebutuhan per jenis nutrisi maka untuk memenuhi kebutuhan harian, ada jenis makanan ada yg minimal dibeli  terkecil 1 pcs dan terbesar 50 pcs
source.7baef764: Cari makanan yang mengandung telur utuh
source.1e62f3c2: Agar lebih jelas dilihat, mari lihat 5 item makanan dengan kalori terbesar
source.01eb957d: Menghitung Rata-rata Karbohidrat, Protein, Sodium pada Putih Telur dan Telur Utuh
source.abc08815: Memilih kolom yang memiliki persentase kebutuhan tubuh (% Daily Value)
source.336d69d7: ## c) Apakah memesan ayam panggang daripada ayam renyah meningkatkan nilai nutrisi sandwich?
source.a21a4567: ## d) Bagaimana nilai nutrisi memesan putih telur daripada telur utuh?
source.77d4e197: Cari makanan yang mengandung putih telur
